name: Living in my Grandpa's House
description:
Made for the Secret Santa Jam 2021!

Living in my Grandpa's House is a short, point-and-click narrative game about facing life's transitions during the holidays. 

Navigate through what was once your Grandpa's house to find pieces of the past as you take steps toward your own future. The choices you make and how you manage your time determine the ending. Made in 30 days for the Secret Santa Jam 2021. This is the first game I've ever made!

GAME CONTROLS
Move - Arrow Keys
Z - Interact

Made with GB Studio
Developed by Petricake Games
